Post.title: CreateJS
Post.content:
CreateJS

CreateJS HTML5

CreateJS

  • EaselJS HTML5
  • TweenJS H5HTML5
  • SoundJS HTML5 audio
  • PreloadJS

EaselJS

EaselJS

EaselJS

EaselJS JavaScript, HTML5 Canvas H5

EaselJS

  1. Stage Class
  2. Text Class
  3. Graphics Class
  4. Shape Class
  5. Bitmap Class
  6. Ticker Class

(Text Class)

<canvas> </canvas> 

// HTML:
<!-- Text Class -->
<canvas id="demo1" width="650" height="400"></canvas>

EaselJSAPI - new createjs.Text()

// JS
<script src="https://code.createjs.com/1.0.0/createjs.min.js"></script>
<script>
  window.onload = () => {
    /**
      * Test Class  -- demo
      */
    let stage1 = new createjs.Stage("demo1");

    let text1 = new createjs.Text("Text 1 !", "bold 26px Arial", "#ff7700");
    text1.regX = -50;     // X
    text1.regY = -50;     // Y
    text1.x = 100;        //  X
    text1.y = 50;         //  Y

    let text2 = new createjs.Text("+XY", "bold 18px Arial", "#ff7700");
    text2.x = 50;
    text2.y = 50;
    text2.rotation = 50;      //  DEG
    text2.scaleX = 3;         // X()
    text2.scaleY = 2;         // X()

    let text3 = new createjs.Text("XY", "bold 50px Arial", "#ff7700");
    text3.x = 300;
    text3.y = 200;
    text3.skewX = 45;         // X DEG
    text3.skewY = 20;         // Y DEG

    let text4 = new createjs.Text("shadow", "bold 30px Arial", "#ff7700");
    text4.x = 400;
    text4.y = 100;
    text4.shadow = new createjs.Shadow("#000000", 5, 5, 10);      // shadowObject

    stage1.addChild(text1, text2, text3, text4);
    stage1.update();    // 
  }
</script>

(Graphics Class)

<canvas> </canvas> 

// HTML:
<!-- Graphics Class -->
<canvas id="demo2" width="650" height="400"></canvas>

EaselJSAPI - new createjs.Graphics()

// JS
<script src="https://code.createjs.com/1.0.0/createjs.min.js"></script>
<script>
  window.onload = () => {
    /**
      * Graphics Class  -- demo
      * 
      */
    let stage2 = new createjs.Stage('demo2')

    // 
    let g = new createjs.Graphics();
    /*  Graphics   g */
    g.setStrokeStyle(10).beginStroke("#d23c4f").moveTo(400,10).lineTo(600,100)
    // 
    g.ss(20).s('#fafa35').mt(400,100).lt(400,260)
    // 
    g.ss(1).s('#000').mt(600,400).lt(600, 200).lt(400,300).lt(500, 550)

    // Graphics  addChild()  stage  Shape 
    let line = new createjs.Shape(g)

    // 
    let g1 = new createjs.Graphics();
    g1.setStrokeStyle(1);         // 
    g1.beginStroke("#000000");    // 
    g1.beginFill("red");          // 
    g1.drawCircle(0,0,100);        //  (X, X, R)
    let c1 = new createjs.Shape(g1)     // Shape

    // 
    let g2 = new createjs.Graphics().beginStroke("red").beginFill("blue").drawRect(150, 0, 200, 100);     // X, Y, W, H
    let c2 = new createjs.Shape(g2)

    // 
    let g3 = new createjs.Graphics();
    // .command
    let fillCommand = g3.beginFill("green").command;
    g3.drawCircle(200,200,50);        //  (X, X, R)
    let c3 = new createjs.Shape(g3);

    // /:
    setTimeout(() => {
      fillCommand.style = "gray";
      stage2.update();                // 
    }, 2000);

    // 
    //c3.addEventListener('click', () => {
    // alert(123)
    // fillCommand.style = "gray";
    // stage2.update();          // 
    //})

    stage2.addChild(c1, c2, c3, line);
    stage2.update();
  }
</script>

imgaes(Bitmap Class)

<canvas> </canvas> 

// HTML:
<!-- Bitmap Class -->
<canvas id="demo3" width="650" height="400"></canvas>

EaselJSAPI - new createjs.Bitmap()

// JS
<script src="https://code.createjs.com/1.0.0/createjs.min.js"></script>
<script>
  window.onload = () => {
    /**
      * bitmap Class 
      * 
      */
    let stage3 = new createjs.Stage('demo3')

    // 
    let bitmap = new createjs.Bitmap('./assets/img/hill1.png')
    bitmap.alpha = 0.6      // 
    bitmap.cursor = 'help'
    // shadowObject(color, offsetX, offsetY, blur)
    bitmap.shadow = new createjs.Shadow("#97c89e", 20, 10, 20);

    // 
    let bitmap2 = new createjs.Bitmap('./assets/img/avatar.jpg')
    bitmap2.x = 400;        // X
    bitmap2.y = 0;          // Y
    //
    let shape = new createjs.Shape();
    shape.graphics.beginFill('#000').drawCircle(0, 0, 100);
    shape.x = 500;          // X
    shape.y = 100;          // Y
    bitmap2.mask = shape;   //bg

    // 
    let groundBg = new createjs.Bitmap("./assets/img/ground.png").image;
    let ground = new createjs.Shape();
    w = stage3.canvas.width;      // 650
    h = stage3.canvas.height;     // 400
    stage3.addChild(ground)

    stage3.addChild(bitmap, bitmap2)
    stage3.update()       // 

    // 
    createjs.Ticker.timingMode = createjs.Ticker.RAF;
    createjs.Ticker.addEventListener('tick',(event) => {
      ground.tileW = groundBg.width;
      ground.y = h - groundBg.height;
      ground.graphics.beginBitmapFill(groundBg).drawRect(0, 0, w, groundBg.height);
      ground.cache(0, 0, w, groundBg.height);

      stage3.update()
    });
  }
</script>

(Demo) Running man

<canvas></canvas>

<!-- HTML -->
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
  <title>running-man game</title>
</head>
<body>
  <canvas id="demoCanvas" width="960" height="400"></canvas>
  </body>
</html>

JS

// JS
<script src="https://code.createjs.com/1.0.0/createjs.min.js"></script>
<script>
  window.onload = () => {
    let stage, w, h, loader;
    let sky, grant, ground, hill, hill2;

    function init() {
      stage = new createjs.StageGL("demoCanvas");

      // 
      w = stage.canvas.width;     // 960
      h = stage.canvas.height;    // 400

      // 
      let manifest = [{
        src: "spritesheet_grant.png", id: "grant"}, {     // 
        src: "sky.png", id: "sky"}, {           // 
        src: "ground.png", id: "ground"}, {     // 
        src: "hill1.png", id: "hill"}, {        // 
        src: "hill2.png", id: "hill2"           // 
      }];     // Array, String, Object

      // 
      // (Boolean) XHRHTML
      // falseXHRtrueXHR
      loader = new createjs.LoadQueue(false);
      // ""
      loader.addEventListener("complete", handleComplete);
      // 
      loader.loadManifest(manifest, true, "./assets/img/");  // (manifest, loadNow, basePath)
    }

    /**
      * 
      */
    function handleComplete() {
      // 
      sky = new createjs.Shape();
      sky.graphics.beginBitmapFill(loader.getResult("sky")).drawRect(0, 0, w, h);
      // ())
      sky.cache(0, 0, w, h);

      // 
      let groundImg = loader.getResult("ground");
      ground = new createjs.Shape();
      // drawRect()
      ground.graphics.beginBitmapFill(groundImg).drawRect(0, 0, w + groundImg.width, groundImg.height);
      ground.tileW = groundImg.width;
      ground.y = h - groundImg.height;
      // ()
      ground.cache(0, 0, w + groundImg.width, groundImg.height);

      // 
      hill = new createjs.Bitmap(loader.getResult("hill"));
      // 
      // setTransform([x=0], [y=0], [scaleX=1], [scaleY=1], [rotation=0], [skewX=0], [skewY=0], [regX=0], [regY=0])
      hill.setTransform(Math.random() * w, h - hill.image.height * 4 - groundImg.height, 4, 4);
      hill.alpha = 0.5;     // 

      // 
      hill2 = new createjs.Bitmap(loader.getResult("hill2"));
      hill2.setTransform(Math.random() * w, h - hill2.image.height * 3 - groundImg.height, 3, 3);

      // 
      let spriteSheet = new createjs.SpriteSheet({
        framerate: 30,      //  FPS
        "images": [loader.getResult("grant")],      // 
        "frames": {"width": 165, "height": 292, "count": 64, "regX": 82, "regY": 0},  // 
        // 
        "animations": {
          "run": [0, 25, "run"],     // name: [, , '', ]
          "jump": [26, 63, "run"]
        }
      });

      // 
      grant = new createjs.Sprite(spriteSheet, "run");
      // 
      grant.y = 35;

      // 
      stage.addChild(sky, ground, hill, hill2, grant);

      // 
      stage.addEventListener("stagemousedown", () => {
        //  jump 
        grant.gotoAndPlay("jump");
      });

      createjs.Ticker.timingMode = createjs.Ticker.RAF;     // RAF / RAF_SYNCHED / TIMEOUT
      createjs.Ticker.addEventListener("tick", tick);
    }


    /**
      * -
      */
    function tick(event) {
      // event.delta -- ticktickms
      let deltaS = event.delta / 1000;
      // 
      let position = grant.x + 150 * deltaS;

      // getBounds() -- 
      let grantW = grant.getBounds().width * grant.scaleX;
      grant.x = (position >= w + grantW) ? -grantW : position;

      ground.x = (ground.x - deltaS * 150) % ground.tileW;

      // 
      hill.x = (hill.x - deltaS * 30);
      // 
      if (hill.x + hill.image.width * hill.scaleX <= 0) {
        hill.x = w;     // 
      }

      // 
      hill2.x = (hill2.x - deltaS * 45);
      if (hill2.x + hill2.image.width * hill2.scaleX <= 0) {
        hill2.x = w;
      }

      stage.update();
    }

    // -
    init()
  }
</script>

demoGitHub

// JS

<script>
  window.onload = () => {
    /**

    text1.regX = -50;     // X

    text2.x = 50;

    text2.rotation = 50;      //  DEG
    text2.scaleX = 3;         // X()
    text2.scaleY = 2;         // X()

  window.onload = () => {

EaselJSAPI - new createjs.Bitmap()

// JS

(Demo) Running man

<canvas></canvas>

<!-- HTML -->
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
  <title>running-man game</title>
</head>
<body>
  <canvas id="demoCanvas" width="960" height="400"></canvas>
  </body>
</html>

JS

// JS
<script src="https://code.createjs.com/1.0.0/createjs.min.js"></script>
<script>
  window.onload = () => {
    let stage, w, h, loader;
    let sky, grant, ground, hill, hill2;

    function init() {
      stage = new createjs.StageGL("demoCanvas");

      // 
      w = stage.canvas.width;     // 960
      h = stage.canvas.height;    // 400

      // 
      let manifest = [{
        src: "spritesheet_grant.png", id: "grant"}, {     // 
        src: "sky.png", id: "sky"}, {           // 
        src: "ground.png", id: "ground"}, {     // 
        src: "hill1.png", id: "hill"}, {        // 
        src: "hill2.png", id: "hill2"           // 
      }];     // Array, String, Object

      // 
      // (Boolean) XHRHTML
      // falseXHRtrueXHR
      loader = new createjs.LoadQueue(false);
      // ""
      loader.addEventListener("complete", handleComplete);
      // 
      loader.loadManifest(manifest, true, "./assets/img/");  // (manifest, loadNow, basePath)
    }

    /**
      * 
      */
    function handleComplete() {
      // 
      sky = new createjs.Shape();
      sky.graphics.beginBitmapFill(loader.getResult("sky")).drawRect(0, 0, w, h);
      // ())
      sky.cache(0, 0, w, h);

      // 
      let groundImg = loader.getResult("ground");
      ground = new createjs.Shape();
      // drawRect()
      ground.graphics.beginBitmapFill(groundImg).drawRect(0, 0, w + groundImg.width, groundImg.height);
      ground.tileW = groundImg.width;
      ground.y = h - groundImg.height;
      // ()
      ground.cache(0, 0, w + groundImg.width, groundImg.height);

      // 
      hill = new createjs.Bitmap(loader.getResult("hill"));
      // 
      // setTransform([x=0], [y=0], [scaleX=1], [scaleY=1], [rotation=0], [skewX=0], [skewY=0], [regX=0], [regY=0])
      hill.setTransform(Math.random() * w, h - hill.image.height * 4 - groundImg.height, 4, 4);
      hill.alpha = 0.5;     // 

      // 
      hill2 = new createjs.Bitmap(loader.getResult("hill2"));
      hill2.setTransform(Math.random() * w, h - hill2.image.height * 3 - groundImg.height, 3, 3);

      // 
      let spriteSheet = new createjs.SpriteSheet({
        framerate: 30,      //  FPS
        "images": [loader.getResult("grant")],      // 
        "frames": {"width": 165, "height": 292, "count": 64, "regX": 82, "regY": 0},  // 
        // 
        "animations": {
          "run": [0, 25, "run"],     // name: [, , '', ]
          "jump": [26, 63, "run"]
        }
      });

      // 
      grant = new createjs.Sprite(spriteSheet, "run");
      // 
      grant.y = 35;

      // 
      stage.addChild(sky, ground, hill, hill2, grant);

      // 
      stage.addEventListener("stagemousedown", () => {
        //  jump 
        grant.gotoAndPlay("jump");
      });

      createjs.Ticker.timingMode = createjs.Ticker.RAF;     // RAF / RAF_SYNCHED / TIMEOUT
      createjs.Ticker.addEventListener("tick", tick);
    }


    /**
      * -
      */
    function tick(event) {
      // event.delta -- ticktickms
      let deltaS = event.delta / 1000;
      // 
      let position = grant.x + 150 * deltaS;

      // getBounds() -- 
      let grantW = grant.getBounds().width * grant.scaleX;
      grant.x = (position >= w + grantW) ? -grantW : position;

      ground.x = (ground.x - deltaS * 150) % ground.tileW;

      // 
      hill.x = (hill.x - deltaS * 30);
      // 
      if (hill.x + hill.image.width * hill.scaleX <= 0) {
        hill.x = w;     // 
      }

      // 
      hill2.x = (hill2.x - deltaS * 45);
      if (hill2.x + hill2.image.width * hill2.scaleX <= 0) {
        hill2.x = w;
      }

      stage.update();
    }

    // -
    init()
  }
</script>

const express = require('express');

// ...

let server = app.listen(3000, function () {
  let host = server.address().address;
  let port = server.address().port;
  console.log('Your App is running at http://%s:%s', host, port);
});

http://localhost:3000

1

F12ChromeDOMid#pane-news<div><ul><li><a>jQuery#pane-news ul li a

2superagent

// 
const superagent= require('superagent');

let hotNews = [];                                // 
let localNews = [];                              // 

/**
 * index.js
 * [description] - superagent.get()
 */
superagent.get('http://news.baidu.com/').end((err, res) => {
  if (err) {
    // 
    console.log(` - ${err}`)
  } else {
   // http://news.baidu.com/res
   // 
   hotNews = getHotNews(res)
  }
});

3getHotNews()

/**
 * index.js
 * [description] - 
 */
// 
const cheerio = require('cheerio');

let getHotNews = (res) => {
  let hotNews = [];
  // http://news.baidu.com/res.text

  /* cheeriocherrio.load()HTMLdocument
     jQuery$(selectior)
   */
  let $ = cheerio.load(res.text);

  // 
  $('div#pane-news ul li a').each((idx, ele) => {
    // cherrio$('selector').each()DOM
    // idxeleDOM
    let news = {
      title: $(ele).text(),        // 
      href: $(ele).attr('href')    // 
    };
    hotNews.push(news)              // 
  });
  return hotNews
};

  1. async/await,Promiseasync/await
  2. superagentgetpostdelteAjax.end().end()errorreserrorerrornullres
  3. cheerio.load()HTML documentjQuery$(selectior)jQuery.each()Google/Baidu

4

const app = express();expressapp
app.get('', async() => {})StringAjaxFunction

/**
 * [description] - 
 */
// get http://localhost:3000async
app.get('/', async (req, res, next) => {
  res.send(hotNews);
});

DOSbaiduNewsnode index.js,http://localhost:3000,
ChromeJSONViewJSON

OK

  1. expressHttp
  2. DOMDOM
  3. superagent
  4. cheerio



1 DOM

F12DOMid#local_newsdivid#localnews-focusulliaid#localnews-zixundivullia

2OKDOMgetLocalNews()

/**
 * [description] - 
 */
let getLocalNews = (res) => {
  let localNews = [];
  let $ = cheerio.load(res);

  // 
  $('ul#localnews-focus li a').each((idx, ele) => {
    let news = {
      title: $(ele).text(),
      href: $(ele).attr('href'),
    };
    localNews.push(news)
  });

  // 
  $('div#localnews-zixun ul li a').each((index, item) => {
    let news = {
      title: $(item).text(),
      href: $(item).attr('href')
    };
    localNews.push(news);
  });

  return localNews
};

superagent.get()getLocalNews()
superagent.get()

superagent.get('http://news.baidu.com/').end((err, res) => {
  if (err) {
    // 
    console.log(` - ${err}`)
  } else {
   // http://news.baidu.com/res
   // 
   hotNews = getHotNews(res)
   localNews = getLocalNews(res)
  }
});

app.get()app.get()

/**
 * [description] - 
 */
// get http://localhost:3000async
app.get('/', async (req, res, next) => {
  res.send({
    hotNews: hotNews,
    localNews: localNews
  });
});

DOShttp://localhost:3000

[ ]

superagent.get('http://news.baidu.com/').end((err, res) => {}).end()res

//  pageRes
let pageRes = {};        // supergaent

// superagent.get()respageRes
superagent.get('http://news.baidu.com/').end((err, res) => {
  if (err) {
    // 
    console.log(` - ${err}`)
  } else {
    // http://news.baidu.com/res
    // 
    // hotNews = getHotNews(res)
    // localNews = getLocalNews(res)
    pageRes = res
  }
});

// pageRes
app.get('/', async (req, res, next) => {
  res.send({
    // {}hotNews: hotNews,
    // localNews: localNews,
    pageRes: pageRes
  });
});

http://localhost:3000

textHTMLtext

app.get('/', async (req, res, next) => {
  res.send(pageRes.text)
}

http://localhost:3000

superagent.get()resDOM[ ]

ElectronJavaScriptChromeNode.jsWeb

NightmareElectronWebPlantomJSRequestURL

// nightmare
yarn add nightmare

coding

index.js

const Nightmare = require('nightmare');          // 
const nightmare = Nightmare({ show: true });     // show:true  

/**
 * [description] - 
 * [nremark] - jsIP
 *  nightmare 
 * js
 */
// 
nightmare
.goto('http://news.baidu.com/')
.wait("div#local_news")
.evaluate(() => document.querySelector("div#local_news").innerHTML)
.then(htmlStr => {
  // 
  localNews = getLocalNews(htmlStr)
})
.catch(error => {
  console.log(` - ${error}`);
})

getLocalNews()

/**
 * [description]- 
 */
let getLocalNews = (htmlStr) => {
  let localNews = [];
  let $ = cheerio.load(htmlStr);

  // 
  $('ul#localnews-focus li a').each((idx, ele) => {
    let news = {
      title: $(ele).text(),
      href: $(ele).attr('href'),
    };
    localNews.push(news)
  });

  // 
  $('div#localnews-zixun ul li a').each((index, item) => {
    let news = {
      title: $(item).text(),
      href: $(item).attr('href')
    };
    localNews.push(news);
  });

  return localNews
}

app.get('/')

/**
 * [description] - 
 */
// get http://localhost:3000async
app.get('/', async (req, res, next) => {
  res.send({
    hotNews: hotNews,
    localNews: localNews
  })
});

DOShttps://localhost:3000

  1. expressHttp
  2. DOMDOM
  3. superagent
  4. JSNightmare
  5. cheerio

Post.title: CSSz-index
Post.content:
CSSz-indexpositionz-indexCSSz-index

z-indexCSSz-indexZz-indexZ

  1. z-indexpositionstatic
  2. Zz-index

(stacking context)HTMLCSS2.1XYZXYZ

()Z

Z

(stacking level/)

  • Z
  • Z

ZZOK

Aa-1a-2Bb-1b-2a-1b-1a-2b-1Aa-1a-2Bb-1b-2

CSS3

  1. HTML<html></html>j
  2. positionstaticz-index
  3. CSS3

1:
divp.ap.bdivp.c.a.b.cpositionz-index

<style>
  div {  
    position: relative;  
    width: 100px;  
    height: 100px;  
  }  
  p {  
    position: absolute;  
    font-size: 20px;  
    width: 100px;  
    height: 100px;  
  }  
  .a {  
    background-color: blue;  
    z-index: 1;  
  }  
  .b {  
    background-color: green;
